name: mndprop

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd))
-| wi(wtru, wb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)))

comment: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is a monoid iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.)
